pymt.mtpyglet.pymt_usage()¶

PyMT Usage: %s [OPTION...]

-h, –help prints this mesage
-f, –fullscreen
 force run in fullscreen
-w, –windowed force run in window
-p, –port=x specify TUIO port (default 3333)

System Message: WARNING/2 (/usr/local/lib/python2.5/pymt/mtpyglet.py:docstring of pymt.mtpyglet.pymt_usage, line 7)

Option list ends without a blank line; unexpected unindent.

-H, –host=xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx specify TUIO host (default 127.0.0.1)
